DESCRIPTION: Persona are 0 cost Skill cards that change the active Arcana and grant special passive effects. You can only have one Persona at a time.
This card belongs to the Fool Arcana.
This card belongs to the Judgement Arcana.
This card belongs to the Death Arcana.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
